title: AAAS: Science Advances: Table of Contents
description: Science Advances: Open access, multidisciplinary science journal.

items.title: Mechanism of D-type cyclin recognition by the AMBRA1 E3 ligase receptor | Science Advances
items.description: Cryo-EM structure reveals how AMBRA1 binds phosphorylated cyclin D1, regulating its stability and controlling cell proliferation.

items.title: 3D stacked IGZO 2T0C DRAM array with multibit capability for computing in memory applications | Science Advances
items.description: An 8 by 8 3D stacked 3-bit IGZO 2T0C DRAM array demonstrates in-memory computing, showing potential to overcome the memory wall.

items.title: Bioinspired metafilms for all-weather energy harvesting: Adaptive thermal regulation and raindrop electricity generation | Science Advances
items.description: A metafilm enables all-weather energy harvesting with self-adaptive thermal management and droplet-induced power generation.

items.title: Single-cell multimodal analysis reveals tumor microenvironment predictive of treatment response in non–small cell lung cancer | Science Advances
items.description: Tumor microenvironmental features predictive of therapeutic response are identified with multimodal biomedical data.

items.title: Broadband photodetection of intense lasers via exciton-enhanced high-order multiphoton-absorption optoelectronics in 2D hybrid perovskite | Science Advances
items.description: Broadband high-power pulsed-laser photodetection is realized by excitonic high-order multiphoton absorption in layered perovskite.

items.title: PTMA controls cardiomyocyte proliferation and cardiac repair by enhancing STAT3 acetylation | Science Advances
items.description: PTMA-mediated cardiomyocyte proliferation repairs ischemic heart injury.

items.title: Disruption of BAG3-mediated BACE1 stabilization alleviates neuropathology and memory deficits in a mouse model of Alzheimer’s disease | Science Advances
items.description: BAG3 interacts with and stabilizes BACE1, which can be disrupted by BACE1-derived interference peptide Tat-BACE1480-494.

items.title: Alcohol molecule coupling: A universal approach to modulating amorphousness in vanadium-based cathodes for high-rate and durable aqueous zinc-ion batteries | Science Advances
items.description: A universal approach is established for producing high-performance vanadium-based cathodes in aqueous zinc-ion batteries.

items.title: Enhanced Rap1 small GTPase activity in the ventral hippocampus drives stress-induced anxiety | Science Advances
items.description: Chronic stress activates Rap1 in vHPC PNs to promote anxiety-like behaviors by increasing their intrinsic excitability.

items.title: Metabolic traits shape responses to LSD1-directed therapy in glioblastoma tumor-initiating cells | Science Advances
items.description: Specific metabolic dependencies and adaptive mechanisms in TICs from glioblastoma can be targeted for therapeutic benefit.

items.title: Complementary corticostriatal circuits orchestrate action repetition and switching | Science Advances
items.description: Complementary brain circuits orchestrate action repetition and switching, revealing mechanisms in health and disease.

items.title: Unraveling plankton adaptation in global oceans through the untargeted analysis of lipidomes | Science Advances
items.description: Lipidomic study shows plankton adaptations to temperature, light, and nutrient changes on a global scale.

items.title: Single-cell profiling demonstrates the combined effect of wheeze phenotype and infant viral infection on airway epithelial development | Science Advances
items.description: Airway epithelial cells from children with wheeze are characterized by altered development and susceptibility to RSV infection.

items.title: Impact plasma amplification of the ancient lunar dynamo | Science Advances
items.description: Large impacts in the presence of a weak dynamo field can explain strong lunar crustal magnetic anomalies.

items.title: Hippocampal Zkscan4 confers resilience to chronic stress–induced depression-like behaviors | Science Advances
items.description: A transcriptional regulatory mechanism implicated in stress resilience.

items.title: Global spatiotemporal patterns of demographic fluctuations in terrestrial vertebrates during the Late Pleistocene | Science Advances
items.description: Genomic meta-analyses revealed global spatiotemporal patterns of demographic fluctuations in terrestrial vertebrates.

items.title: Socioeconomic and temporal heterogeneity in SARS-CoV-2 exposure and disease in England from May 2020 to February 2023 | Science Advances
items.description: Deprivation and ethnicity influenced COVID-19 outcomes, revealing health inequalities and vaccine effectiveness in the pandemic.

items.title: Amphiphilic nanopores that condense undersaturated water vapor and exude water droplets | Science Advances
items.description: Amphiphilic nanopores condense water vapor and exude water droplets under isothermal and undersaturated conditions.

items.title: Variable mantle redox states driven by deeply subducted carbon | Science Advances
items.description: Subducted carbonates exert distinct effects under mantle redox conditions in plume versus nonplume environments.

items.title: Poorly quantified trends in ammonium nitrate remain critical to understand future urban aerosol control strategies | Science Advances
items.description: Regulatory monitors fail to measure ammonium nitrate aerosol, masking its importance as a top aerosol pollutant in Los Angeles.
